   "cell_type": "markdown",

   "source": [
    "# Convolution of the flux and interaction cross-section"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Miscellaneous:"

  },

   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import sys\n",
    "\n",
    "sys.path.append(\"../../..\")\n",
    "\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "from matplotlib import rc\n",
    "from src.nu_osc.default_parameters import CONV_CM2_TO_BARN"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "<p> </p>\n",
    "To make plots more beautiful"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "rc(\"figure\", figsize=(10, 5))\n",
    "# rc('lines', linewidth=2)\n",
    "rc(\"axes\", labelsize=12, linewidth=1, grid=True, labelpad=-1)\n",
    "rc(\"axes.spines\", right=True)\n",
    "rc(\"xtick\", direction=\"in\", labelsize=12, top=True)\n",
    "rc(\"xtick.major\", width=0.8, size=5)\n",
    "rc(\"ytick\", direction=\"in\", labelsize=12, right=True)\n",
    "rc(\"ytick.major\", width=0.8, size=5)\n",
    "rc(\"legend\", fancybox=False, fontsize=12, shadow=False)\n",
    "rc(\n",
    "    \"grid\",\n",
    "    linewidth=1.0,\n",
    ")  # ls='dotted')\n",
    "# import matplotlib_inline\n",
    "# matplotlib_inline.backend_inline.set_matplotlib_formats('retina')"
   ]
  },

   "cell_type": "markdown",

    "## Inferred fluxes at SK from ND280"
   ]
  },

   "cell_type": "markdown",

    "<p> </p>\n",
    "Defining a $\\texttt{pandas dataframe}$:"
   ]

   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,

   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>minE</th>\n",
       "      <th>maxE</th>\n",
       "      <th>numu</th>\n",
       "      <th>antinumu</th>\n",
       "      <th>nue</th>\n",

      ]

   ],
   "source": [
    "fluxes = pd.read_csv(\n",
    "    \"t2kflux_2020_plus250kA_nominal_sk.csv\",\n",
    "    delimiter=\",\",\n",
    "    usecols=(lambda x: x != \"Bin#\"),\n",
    ")\n",
    "fluxes = fluxes.rename(columns={\"anti-numu\": \"antinumu\", \"anti-nue\": \"antinue\"})\n",
    "fluxes.head()"
   ]
  },

       "count  138.000000  138.000000  1.380000e+02    138.000000   138.000000   \n",
       "mean     3.777174    3.994565  3.667457e+05  19051.943014  2801.880065   \n",
       "std      7.011859    7.350760  4.188749e+05  14349.800825  2179.844692   \n",
       "min      0.000000    0.010000  0.000000e+00      0.000000     0.000000   \n",
       "25%      0.342500    0.352500  1.030000e+04   2105.000000   427.750000   \n",

       "75%    490.750000  \n",
       "max    531.000000  "
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 5,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fluxes.describe()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 1000x500 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "plt.step(fluxes.minE, fluxes.numu, label=r\"$\\nu_\\mu$\")\n",
    "plt.step(fluxes.minE, fluxes.nue, label=r\"$\\nu_e$\")\n",
    "plt.step(fluxes.minE, fluxes.antinumu, label=r\"$\\overline{\\nu}_\\mu$\")\n",
    "plt.step(fluxes.minE, fluxes.antinue, label=r\"$\\overline{\\nu}_e$\")\n",
    "plt.axvline(x=0.6, linestyle=\"--\", color=\"black\")\n",
    "plt.annotate(r\"600 MeV\", xy=(0.5, 1), fontsize=10, rotation=90)\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.xscale(\"log\")\n",
    "plt.yscale(\"log\")\n",
    "plt.xlabel(r\"$E$ [GeV]\")\n",
    "plt.ylabel(\n",
    "    r\"Flux [$\\text{cm}^{-2}\\cdot (50\\,\\text{MeV})^{-1} \\cdot (10^{21}\\,\\text{PoT})^{-1}$]\"\n",
    ")\n",
    "plt.ylim(bottom=1e-1)\n",
    "plt.title(r\"T2K Flux 2020 | Nominal conditions | SK | $+250$ kA\")\n",
    "plt.legend()\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "fluxes = fluxes.assign(total=lambda df: df.numu + df.nue + df.antinumu + df.antinue)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 1000x500 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "plt.step(fluxes.minE, fluxes.numu / fluxes.total, label=r\"$\\nu_\\mu$\")\n",
    "plt.step(fluxes.minE, fluxes.nue / fluxes.total, label=r\"$\\nu_e$\")\n",
    "plt.step(fluxes.minE, fluxes.antinumu / fluxes.total, label=r\"$\\overline{\\nu}_\\mu$\")\n",
    "plt.step(fluxes.minE, fluxes.antinue / fluxes.total, label=r\"$\\overline{\\nu}_e$\")\n",
    "plt.axvline(x=0.6, linestyle=\"--\", color=\"black\")\n",
    "plt.annotate(r\"600 MeV\", xy=(0.5, 4e-1), fontsize=10, rotation=90)\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.xscale(\"log\")\n",
    "# plt.yscale('log')\n",
    "plt.xlabel(r\"$E$ [GeV]\")\n",
    "plt.ylabel(r\"Relative flux per bin\")\n",
    "# plt.ylim(bottom=1e-4)\n",
    "plt.title(r\"T2K Flux 2020 | Nominal conditions | SK | $+250$ kA\")\n",
    "plt.legend()\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 9,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>numu</th>\n",
       "      <th>nue</th>\n",
       "      <th>antinumu</th>\n",
       "      <th>antinue</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>abs</th>\n",
       "      <td>30.182094</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.358409</td>\n",
       "      <td>2.030763</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.055815</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>relat</th>\n",
       "      <td>0.925063</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.010985</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.062242</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.001711</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "            numu       nue  antinumu   antinue\n",
       "abs    30.182094  0.358409  2.030763  0.055815\n",
       "relat   0.925063  0.010985  0.062242  0.001711"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 9,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "integrals = {}\n",
    "summed_integral = 0\n",
    "for key in ['numu', 'nue', 'antinumu', 'antinue']:\n",
    "    integrals[key] = [((fluxes.maxE - fluxes.minE) * fluxes[key]).sum() * (50 * 1e21) / (1e3 * CONV_CM2_TO_BARN)] # result in pb/PoT\n",
    "    summed_integral += integrals[key][0]\n",
    "for key in ['numu', 'nue', 'antinumu', 'antinue']:\n",
    "    integrals[key].append(integrals[key][0]/summed_integral)\n",
    "pd.DataFrame(integrals, index=['abs', 'relat'])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "<p> </p>"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "So that the integrated flux at SK (2020, nominal, FHC) per chanel is\n",
    "$$\n",
    "\\begin{matrix}\n",
    "    \\Phi_{\\nu_\\mu} & = & 30.182 & (\\text{b} \\cdot \\text{PoT})^{-1} & & & (92.51 \\%) \\\\\n",
    "    \\Phi_{\\nu_e} & = & 0.358 & (\\text{b} \\cdot \\text{PoT})^{-1} & & & (1.10 \\%) \\\\\n",
    "    \\Phi_{\\overline{\\nu}_\\mu} & = & 2.031 & (\\text{b} \\cdot \\text{PoT})^{-1} & & & (6.22 \\%) \\\\\n",
    "    \\Phi_{\\overline{\\nu}_e} & = & 0.056 & (\\text{b} \\cdot \\text{PoT})^{-1} & & & (0.17 \\%) \\\\ \\\\\n",
    "    \\hline \\\\\n",
    "    \\Phi_\\text{tot} & = & 32.627 & (\\text{b} \\cdot \\text{PoT})^{-1} & & & (100 \\%) \n",
    "\\end{matrix}\n",
    "$$"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "___________________________________"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Interaction cross-section of the CCQE"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 16,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>energy</th>\n",
       "      <th>xsec</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>0</th>\n",
       "      <td>0.036370</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.031034</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>1</th>\n",
       "      <td>0.037162</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.062069</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2</th>\n",
       "      <td>0.038796</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.093103</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>3</th>\n",
       "      <td>0.040502</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.120690</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>4</th>\n",
       "      <td>0.042283</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.165517</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "     energy      xsec\n",
       "0  0.036370  0.031034\n",
       "1  0.037162  0.062069\n",
       "2  0.038796  0.093103\n",
       "3  0.040502  0.120690\n",
       "4  0.042283  0.165517"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 16,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "xsec = pd.read_csv(\n",
    "    \"neutrino_ccqe.csv\",\n",
    "    delimiter=\";\",\n",
    "    names=['energy','xsec']\n",
    ")\n",
    "xsec.head()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 17,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",

    "plt.step(xsec.energy, xsec.xsec, label=r\"CCQE\", where='mid')\n",
    "plt.axvline(x=0.6, linestyle=\"--\", color=\"black\")\n",
    "plt.annotate(r\"600 MeV\", xy=(0.45, 2e-1), fontsize=10, rotation=90)\n",
    "\n",
    "plt.xscale(\"log\")\n",
    "# plt.yscale(\"log\")\n",
